message.body: in one week we will be drinking beers at hooters
yup
cannot wait
just wrote back my thoughts on Paulus
how would you feel if Paulus came to Cuse?
tried to be as objective as possible knowing that I hate him
but what if he is the best QB on the roster?
i can't see that happening
this kid is no Tebow, Vick, McNabb, Graves, McCoy, Young
i really can't
we have an unknown redshirt freshmen
yeah, but he's taken all of the snaps with the 1st team in spring ball
so
I don't see the risk
has been the guy in all of the scrimmages, building report with the WRs and the rest of the offense
if he is better than Nassib you wouldn't want that?
i don't see the benefit--cause I think he's going to suck
if he is worse then he doesn't play
but you have ZERO knowledge on that
same as any of us
none of us kno
w
I do know that if you haven't done something in 5 years, you probably aren't going to be good at it right off the bat
especially at a level completely different from what he's ever previously experienced
and let's be honest
there is no point in doing this if he can't play right away...and play well
so then he doesn't play
how does that hurt us?
because what if Nassib struggles...if he's your long term answer at QB...then what good are you doing him?
if he's good enough to supplant two guys who have played a bunch (at poor levels) then why not roll with him?
no way he is the long term answer
how do you know that?
Loeb will be the same thing
we are bringin him in
yeah, but different
he has less eligability
he's here for the long haul
he is recruited by the staff
he will put pressure on Nassib
I completely disagree about having someone behind Nassib
if he struggles then that means our team is not doing well
play the best players
if Paulus gives us a better chance to win this year great
gives Loeb and Nassib a year to grow
Nassib knows that Loeb was this staff's recruit so he is going to feel the same pressure from him
yeah, i get your points
i just disagree withthem
how is paulus any different than loeb?
well Loeb actually played football instead of sat on a bench
so there's that
but greg that will take care of itself
if he sucks he doesnt play
so why worry about that
like i said, i get your points
i just disagree with them
so if he sucks you think he will play still?
so we can go on for the next hour or so
well, if we are going to be honest
how good do you think the eagles will be?
what
don't mean eagles
cuse
how good do you think we'll be?
anywhere from 3-6 wins
brutally honest
not good
exactly
so what does paulus do for us if he comes and plays?
even if he's a decent QB?
if he is a better QB you could mean the difference between 3 and 6
which is huge
if we get to 6 and bowl eligible then i agree with you
but at the same time, he's taking away reps and coaching from Nassib and Loeb the whole year...and who will probably be your #1 and #2 QB heading into 2010
so if you don't make a bowl game, what have you accomplished with Paulus?
well if he isn't good enough make us that much better I honestly don't think he takes reps away because he doesn't play
also Nassib is Freshman
and he was no big time recruit
he could use the years of seasoning
but reshirted...so he has more experience than Paulus already
ok then he plays if he is better
win win
I don't see the risk
right, but what's the point of bringing him in? for media attention?
if nassib or loeb are equally as good or better you give them the nod
what if he is really good
he was the best QB in the country his senior year in HS
he def has talent
yeah--5 years ago
don't disagree
Greg I am not arguing that he will eb good
I have no clue
jsut like you
but what if he is
he makes us better
if he isn't
he doesn't play
and how good have the players from that program turned out?
then he doesnt play
fine
i just don't see the point of having him on the squad...especially in Marronne's first year
if you are building a company, do you hire a CEO for only 1 year?
if the max time a CEO could be at a company was 4 years
and I had no proven CEOs
and I could hire that CEO - try him out and if I don't like him I can just basically put him at some other position
then absolutely
competition breeds success
I don't have high hopes for Paulus
like i've said, you make good points, and I see your side of the argument and all the valid points
but I don't agree with them
but what don't you agree with
lets say Paulus comes in and is bad
what happens?
you have a big loser on the roster all year
wasted scholarship
which will be used by whom?
wasted snaps in fall practice
no one at this point
cause they'll ahve to evaluate him
we only wil have 3 QBxs
we need 4
calling him a big loser is just you being biased
you say to Nassib--you have the job locked down...but now you don't and have to compete with this guy we got from the streets 5 years after he last played in a competitive game of football
they never said he had the job locked down
never
he is the starter going into fall practive
he is well aware that Loeb is coming in and competing to be the starter as well
but you aren't answering the question
if he comes in and sucks what happens
he sits the becn correct?
wastes a scholarship
which wouldn't be used otherwise
yes, but he also takes away snaps from nassib and Loeb
not if he sucks
because you know that he's going to be "evaluated"
and given more than his fair share because of all the hype
but we are a QB short
anyways
we will always carry 4 except this year
PSU is only carrying 3 QBs
it's not a big deal
pros do it all the time
but Marrone has already stated that he wants 4
not saying it is a big deal
but we will carry 4
Marrone wants 4 scholarship QBs on his roster
yeah, i want a million bucks
not relevant
and they had them
until Legree transferred
yep
now 3
we need a kicker more than we need Paulus
so paulus fills legrees void
paulus is not stopping us from getting a kicker
so let's sign Duke's best soccer player
I would take a kicker over paulus any day
cause I don't need a baby
here's my issue
i don't believe the hype
this is all hype
he's not that athletic of a guy in my mind and he was good in HS...so what does that mean?
absolutely nothing
so what's the point?
he was a division I PG
starting
is he the most athletic
and as he supposedly got better
no way
but he is a damn good athlete
his minutes went down
no doubt
and was evenutally benched
so what
so where is teh progress in his game?
he is still athletic enough to play PG at the highest level in college basketball
and he's going to be able to progress from not playing in 5 years to a starting QB?
no clue
if he doesn't he rides the pine
no sweat off my sack
i just don't believe any of this media circus...what's the advantage of having him on the team if he sucks?
answer me that
no advantage at all
no disadvantae either
I don't think he hurts us if he sucks
but if he comes in and is good
we have a solid starting QB
IF
if he's good, how do we know that his good will be anything?
like I said - you and I have no clue on his talent
we cannot argue one way or the other with any solid foundation
it is just speculation
my only point is that if somehow he comes in and is by far the best QB on the team it would make us better
if he is not then he rides the pine and Nassib and Loeb are the future for now
Until we get Mike Vick
ha
what if he came in and was as good as Chase Daniels was a sophmore
I am trying to find the most realistic/optimistic comparison
3,000 yds 28TDs 10 Ints
woudl you take that?
of course i'm not and idiot
but come on
are we living in reality or a wet dream?
that would be a wet dream
but that was his soph year
first year starting
yes I know the 4 year layoff wasnt there
ha
i was typing that
i know
I don't think you forget that much though
and it will be 5 years in the fall
but who knows
true
and I really do see your points
i jsut don't see the risk
and of course i want anything that is good for the program
i just think I'd rather build with what we have for this year
cause i don't see him doing anything
i'd rather find out what Nassib has
but the coaches know
and if Paulus sucks do you not think Nassib will play?
coaches know what?
what they have with Nassib?
they have an idea
yes
anf if Paulus gives us a better chance to win
they will play him
if Nassib gives us a better chance
play him
I don't see the downside in that
cause winning is all that matters
spent 6 years in the minors
so it isn't crazy to think someone can come back to football and be effective
he also sat a year at FSU before starting
yes but then almost won the natinoal championship his first year
true
I will tkae half that
but it's not like he walked off the diamond (bball court)
he had a full year of football activity, training, learning the offense
he also had Peter Warrick and the FSU defense
i'
i'll put it this way
if paulus ends up at cuse
and gets the QB spot
and plays great
i'll be the first to admit i was wrong
and i'll be happy for him/the program if that happens
but i don't see it happening
ok lets say he doesn't do well
he comes and Nassib beats him out for the starting position
are we worse off at that point?
how long does it take for that decision to happen?
pretty quick
and is paulus our backup
or Dantley?
Nassib separated himself from Cam within 3 spring practives
whoever is better is the backup
you chose
you know he's going to end up at Michigan though, right?
cause they have no starter
same as us
Focier
freshman
true frosh though
more highly touted than Nassib
yes
but i don't care about the touted part
Nassib didn't get a single rep with 1st 2nd or 3rd string last year
true...yet even GRob's staff thought he'd be the starter this year
k
not tough when your competition is a former walk on
very true
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=26k9qJ2xgxo
i admit that he's pretty beast in HS
too bad about KG
i was excited for the boston v. cavs
series
he was amazing in HS
yeah
how would you compare the competition you play against in ice hockey
now
hmm
better than HS?
a bunch of ex-college guys
definitely
but then there are scrubs like m
how do you play?
me
pretty poorly
to be honest
were you way better in HS?
or jsut really good comp?
the comp is better
a lot of these guys would be studs in HS in the league i played in
they mostly played in elite prep schools
but you picked it up pretty quick right?
after not playing Ice Hockey for 6 yearrs
the skating, yes
but not my hands
my hands suck now
i used to be a good shooter
and i can't shoot for shit anymore
like i don't have the same feel for the puck
maybe if we had practices that would come more
but i don't know
i also played a game that was based on being physical
and we can't hit in this league
though I'd probably get rocked in this league
i should probably play a level or 2 down
but i like playing with the better guys
more challenging
so i think paulus can definitely get it back
but i think other parts he'll struggle with
haha
I am intrigued - was intrigued with him going to UM
I hope he plays somewhere
i'm intrigued
and i hope he plays at UM
I think it would be cool if he played well
cause i think he'll get rocked
i want the PSU defense to light him up
but if he's good, i want him at Cuse
how's that for flip-flopping?
haha
paulus had 4 TOs in that game
i sent you
3 picks and a fumble
but a good game
Weis is big on Clausen this spring
clausen needs to step it up
how good do you think clausen would be in his 1st year
after not playing football for 5 years?
just as highly, if not more highly recruited QB
clausen isn't as athletic so I think that hurts him
true
but he's got a family pedigree
just like paulus
but I think mentally and physically he would be in much better shape
and was an absolute stud in HS
I have no clue how not playing for 5 years would affect him
agian my argument has nothing to do with talent assesment - because I admit I have no clue
at all
I only believe it is worth the risk
because if for some reason he is just a natural QB and is a good QB and the best on our roster it makes us better
and this is a huge season for recrutiging
we do well and attract recruits we are off to the races
if we do poorly and recruit poorly it is going to be even more difficult to rightthe ship
very true
i think paulus will go to mich
because he'll get more exposure there
whcih he needs sicne he has 1 year
the novelty of a new staff/system/regime will be long gone if we suck this year
no doubt
but Spence will be a huge lure for him
we have to get 4 games in my mind
and be competitive
why?
his CBA coach and Spence are think as theives
thick
ah
still
they basically run a HS version of Spence
's offense
how many times will he be on national TV with Mich...versus Cuse
will it be worth anythign if he is on the bench?
i think he has just a good a shot at Mich
I would take Forcier over Nassib if I was drafting
he's competing on the same exact level with someone that isn't in the system already
of course
so it isnt even then
but Forcier is starting from zero
just like Paulus
Nassib has a year of college and spring ball under his belt
but he is competing against their talent
Nassib has a year of scout team under his belt
I will give you that
but not nearly as talented (speculation)
but who would you rather have? a guy that can operate the system or a guy with talent that can't?
remember this is college
so system QBs can win you titles
of course
not sure what your questino is
I want a guy who can operate the system
and is talented
but if nassib isn't as talented
yes but I will take operate system over talent
it is a brand new system
he has 10 practices in it
Paulus played in a stripped down version of it for 4 years
Forcier and Nassib have exactly the same amount of time in their current system by the way
Nassib has year of scout team under a terrible staff - not sure how much that is worth
what you think about me listing Carlson above Cooley?
I think he is a better traditinoal TE
how about Kearney?
i really thought this would get chatter going
instead...nothing
hhaa
yeah Kearney was hurt so can't say much
if he is healthy he is the best
if not -- who konws
only one I would disagree with is prob Lofa
if he was older then last years injuries would be considering something that is slowing him down
but two years ago he was possibily the best MLB in the NFC
last year our D was terrible and he was injured most of the year
with a banged up knee
yeah
that's why i said the #1 part
yeah I would still put him there to start though
other than that I would agree with all
I think Hill will end up being better than Pace
but has to prove it
looks like i'll be coming down to PA the weekend after draft
what are you up to?
playing golf with my aunt
on saturday
nice
i think the eagles will get this guy
instead of Pettigrew

SLEEPER Richard Quinn, North Carolina Height, weight: 6-4, 264 40-yard dash: 4.85 Projected round: 3-4 Mayock: "In this day and age of spread offenses in college, there are no in-line blockers. And this kid's the best blocking tight end in the draft. He had just 5-6 catches as a senior. Nobody knows how good his hands are. But they're much better than people think. [North Carolina coach] Butch Davis told me the biggest disservice he did to any kid last year was not throwing the ball more to Quinn. But he had three NFL-style wideouts on the outside. This kid could go as high as the third round because of his blocking ability. He's a 4.8-4.85 kid that will catch the football."
yeah
hpefully because they send a #1 to the cards for boldin
maybe both 1s to hawks
yes
do it
nah
making funnies
right back at you
look at mine
love it
we need to do soemthing to joey since he's leaving so early
dude, i'd kill for wings and beer right now
you've convinced me not to be against the Paulus possibility...i'm not really for it...but i'll support it if it happens
good
I am not hugely for it eitehr
I just don't see a big downside
like playing the loterry
only cost me $1 but there is a chance of winning big
although a small chance
it does exist
true
but what about the wings and beer
so close!

next week only 3 hours we'd be leavng
Will is coming up early
i know

and then heading to my house

i think that's because of all the trades that are in play for them
late in the draft the eagles will certainly take someone who can return punts
cause i don't think they are putting Jackson back there unless they need a big return
too risky since they need him to take even a bigger role in the offense this eyar
what if you guys draft greg paulus to be your KR
PR
love it
like the towel boy for michigan
in Water Boy

really?
yup
woudl you still trade your other 1st for Boldin?
I would
to come out of the draft with two all pros
absolutely
in a heartbeat
you have to be happy about that trade
the peters
yes
very
ok say you pick up Boldin
for this years first and maybe a 3rd in next years draft?
who would you pick ideally in the second round
RB
defense right?
you go RB?
yes
if we get Boldin?
that would be a fun draft
yeah
yes
Brown from UCONN
or they wait
so you walk away with elite caliber LT, pro bowl caliber WR, and a share the load caliber step in right away RB
yes
I would be jealous of that
squish squish
are you comfortable with your safeties?
if we don't get boldin--as long as he doesn't go to the Giants, i'm very happy with our off-season
if we have a solid draft
you know?
comfortable?
he's right below Pro Bowl level good
yeah
other safety spot
I feel safety you don't have to have probowlers
not so confident
just solid steady players
but we have adequate guys there
would be happy to pick someone up though
like deon grant isn't a probowler but I will take him forever
or his caliber
if sean smith were available, i'd be very happy
Michael Hamlin could start at FS for you guys and will prob be a 3rd rounder
or David Bruton
hahaha
althogh he is more of a SS
hamlin
you need FS right?
well, Mikelly can play either
and Sean Jones is a SS
Demps is a FS
so i don't knwo what they are going to do
you know what
we are one step closer to teh Eagles not picking in the first round
for the 3rd straight year
yep
although one step closer to not picking an OL in the first round
yes
another plus
i'd be so happy with we get Boldin too
so happy
would you be ok with giving up 1st and this years 3rd?
yes
we still have 2nd
and four 5th rounders
so we can get back into the 4th round
for depth guys
